I\'m Yuto Takano (moa17stock@gmail.com) and I made Linear Regression Calculator. I used this project to kickstart my adventure into Java and Android programming, and to also implement a practical Linear Regression algorithm.
This app uses OjAlgo by Optimatika to ease matrix calculation. OjAlgo is released under the MIT license.
